According to https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/bioc/vignettes/bsseq/inst/doc/bsseq_analysis.html.

#### Negative control
- read in data:
```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library("bsseq")

M <- read.csv("data/data_neg_control.M", header=TRUE, sep="\t")
cov <- read.csv("data/data_neg_control.cov", header=TRUE, sep="\t")
chr <- M$chr
pos <- M$pos
M$chr <- NULL
M$pos <- NULL
cov$chr <- NULL
cov$pos <- NULL
M <- data.matrix(M)
cov <- data.matrix(cov)
sampleNames <- gsub(".M", "", colnames(M))
colnames(M) <- sampleNames
colnames(cov) <- sampleNames

bs <- BSseq(chr=chr, pos=pos, M=M, Cov = cov, sampleNames=sampleNames)
```
- smoothing:
```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
bs.smoothed <- BSmooth(bs, verbose=TRUE)

saveRDS(bs.smoothed, "analysis.RData", compress = T)

load("analysis.RData")
```
